items.title: Application Engineer
items.summary: Enterprise products: real-time customer alerts for credit & identity theft.
impact: Built and maintained Spring Batch pipelines processing high-volume real-time alerts
Implemented automated alert threshold stop mechanism for safer production runs
Improved observability with structured logging and standardized error handling
Worked on vendor API integrations for reliable ingestion and processing

items.title: Full Stack Java Developer
items.summary: Small engineering team focused on delivering secure enterprise applications.
impact: Delivered backend services and frontend features across full-stack Java ecosystem
Refactored legacy components to improve reliability and maintainability
Collaborated directly with stakeholders in a lean team environment

items.title: Software Engineering Intern
items.summary: Internship focused on web application enhancements and feature delivery.
impact: Assisted in frontend feature implementation and backend integration
Participated in requirement analysis and testing cycles

items.title: Software Engineer
items.summary: Enterprise Java development with focus on stable delivery and production support.
impact: Developed backend services and supported release cycles
